alert.note: Alert for York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued January 09 at 4:54PM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... Eastern Gaston County in the piedmont of North Carolina... Mecklenburg County in the piedmont of North Carolina... Northeastern York County in upstate South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EST. * At 454 PM EST, Select stream gages throughout greater Charlotte... westward into eastern Gaston County and south into the Rock Hill area remain in flood and will take into the early evening hours before high water conditions recede. Remain wary of widespread moderate flooding across Charlotte proper and heed road closures! HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
